structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Pro Rata Shares Of Tortfeasors In Entire Liability; Determination
law.text: In determining the pro rata shares of tortfeasors in the entire liability (a) their relative degrees of fault shall not be considered; (b) if equity requires, the collective liability of some as a group shall constitute a single share; and (c) principles of equity applicable to contribution generally shall apply.
